content.normal: This is my first day starting writing something I, indeed, pay attention to and want to write down. Unintentionally, I mentioned about age,the sensitive topic ever, with my friends. I was not surprised by the larger numbers than I guessed; instead, I did admire them because the time hasn't suppressed their personalities, and their value. I always worry my dream not being able to come true, which, in fact, verifies I am afraid of time. However, after the trivial conversation, I gained quite a little confidence.

content.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
